structure.unit: A EXECUTIVE BRANCH CODE OF ETHICS

law.catch_line: Authorization for compliance investigations by Attorney General and his designees.
law.text: The Attorney General and any assistant or special counsel designated by him may investigate compliance with KRS 11A.201 to 11A.246.
law.history: Created 1993 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 54, effective September 16, 1993.
